text:
...Yes, we're good to go!
Please wait while we adjust the lighting.

Good job, it's looking good so far.
The costumes are really standing out.

...You mentioned it, didn't you?
That these costumes will become noctchill's symbol.

The costumes take the spotlight.
I just need to follow that expression.

And what's created is an idol.
...That's quite a statement.
Well... it's actually the other way around.

The costumes are there to enhance the charm of the idol.
And this photoshoot is also done to promote Madoka Higuchi.

We're helping the world discover "noctchill's Higuchi Madoka".
That's what this is all about.
...I don't think I have that much value to offer.
